Class AbsenceDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AbsenceDAO
public class AbsenceDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Absence entities. Provides CRUD operations for the Absence table in the database.

    • addAbsence

      public int addAbsence(Absence absence) throws SQLException
      Creates a new absence in the database.
      Parameters:
      absence - The absence object to be added to the database
      Returns:
      The generated absence ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getAbsenceById

      public Optional<Absence> getAbsenceById(int absenceId)
      Retrieves an absence by its ID.
      Parameters:
      absenceId - The ID of the absence to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the absence if found, or empty if not found

    • getAllAbsences

      public List<Absence> getAllAbsences()
      Retrieves all absences from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all absences

    • getAbsencesByStudent

      public List<Absence> getAbsencesByStudent(int studentId)
      Retrieves absences for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      Returns:
      A list of absences for the specified student

    • getAbsencesByStatus

      public List<Absence> getAbsencesByStatus(boolean status)
      Retrieves absences by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter by (true = excused, false = unexcused)
      Returns:
      A list of absences with the specified status

    • updateAbsence

      public boolean updateAbsence(Absence absence)
      Updates an existing absence record.
      Parameters:
      absence - The absence object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateAbsenceStatus

      public boolean updateAbsenceStatus(int absenceId, boolean status) throws SQLException
      Updates the status of an absence.
      Parameters:
      absenceId - The ID of the absence to update
      status - The new status (true = excused, false = unexcused)
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs

    • deleteAbsence

      public boolean deleteAbsence(int absenceId)
      Deletes an absence from the database.
      Parameters:
      absenceId - The ID of the absence to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • countAbsencesByStudent

      public int countAbsencesByStudent(int studentId)
      Counts the number of absences for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      Returns:
      The number of absences for the student
